column1: This is a long text that needs to be summarized. It contains multiple sentences and various details that can be shortened.
column2: "This is a summary of the long text."

column1: Another example of a long text that can be summarized to a shorter version using BART.
Summarization is the process of reducing a text to its main points. This text needs to be summarized.
This project involves fine-tuning BART to summarize long texts effectively and efficiently.
BART is a powerful model for text generation tasks including summarization.
